question.title: Will Israel pass the Penal Bill (Death Penalty for Terrorists amendment) into law before April 2026?
question.resolution_criteria: The question will resolve as **Yes** if, before April 1, 2026, UTC, the Penal Bill (Amendment No. 159) (Death Penalty for Terrorists) 2025 is passed officially into law in the Knesset according to [the official Knesset website](https://main.knesset.gov.il/EN/Pages/default.aspx).
question.fine_print:
It is irrelevant whether the Knesset website is updated before April 1, 2026; all that matters is whether the law itself passes before the deadline.

If the Penal Bill (Amendment No. 159) (Death Penalty for Terrorists) 2025 is modified significantly in content such that it no longer provides for the death penalty, then this question will resolve as **No** even if it is passed into law.
